survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Pet Food Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and preferences regarding subscription-based pet food delivery services, including delivery experience, product quality, and customization options.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based pet food delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based pet food delivery service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a pet food delivery service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections (checkbox). Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a pet food delivery service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you adjust your pet food subscription (e.g., change delivery frequency, meal plan, or protein options)?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Not applicable' option if needed for non-subscribers.

script.question_text: How often do you adjust your pet food subscription (e.g., change delivery frequency, meal plan, or protein options)?

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have encountered with your pet food delivery service.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have encountered with your pet food delivery service.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current pet food delivery service to other pet owners?
questions.client_notes: Use for Net Promoter Score (NPS) calculation. Ensure clear wording.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current pet food delivery service to other pet owners?
